404.heading: Nothing here.
404.message: The page you’re looking for cannot be found. If you are having trouble accessing pages for a particular project, please email <0>contact@zooniverse.org</0> for assistance.
404.findNewProject: Find a new project to explore

AuthenticationInvitation.announcement: Please sign in or sign up to track your contributions.

FinishedAnnouncement.announcement: Finished! Looks like this project is out of data at the moment!

Head.defaultDescription: The Zooniverse is the world’s largest and most popular platform for people-powered research.

ProjectStatistics.subtitle: Keep track of the progress you and your fellow volunteers have made on this project.
ProjectStatistics.text: Every click counts! Join {{projectName}}'s community to complete this project and help researchers produce important results. Click "View more stats" to see even more stats.
ProjectStatistics.title: {{projectName}} Statistics

RequireUser.text: You need to be signed in!

SubjectPicker.heading: Choose a subject to get started
SubjectPicker.byline: Sort the list by clicking column names. You will see subjects sequentially, starting with the one you choose.

SubjectSetPicker.heading: Choose where to start
SubjectSetPicker.byline: Choose a subject set to start transcribing.

WorkflowSelector.message: You can do real research by clicking to get started here!
